msg: Some updates to the Stanbol Enhancement Structure.

author: ivan
msg: Fix Windows retry loop error handling when removing file.
(svn_io_remove_file2): Check apr_err before returning error to handle
situation when WIN32_RETRY_LOOP recovered original error.
